---
title: Vector
description: "A table of values that has either a single row or a single column. See also [matrix](matrix.qmd)."
---

---

The order of a vector is row by column.

Below is a $1 \times 3$ column vector.
$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 \\
2 \\
3 \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Below is a $3 \times 1$ row vector.
$$
\begin{bmatrix}
1 & 2 & 3
\end{bmatrix}
$$
